name: Mobile Wars X
description: Mobile Wars X is a shoot them up in which you must fight against an alien invasion. You can choose between 3 Mobile X: A very fast ship capable of firing tracking missiles, A robot with advanced ninja weapons and a special ship with unique laser attacks!
minimum_requirements: OS: Windows 7 64-bit Processor: Intel Core 2 Quad @ 2.8 GHz or AMD Phenom X4 Memory: 2 GB RAM Graphics: Radeon HD 7770 or Nvidia GeForce GTX 550 Ti Storage: 500 MB available space
recommended_requirements: OS: Windows 7 64-bit Processor: Intel Core i5 @ 3.3 GHz or AMD Phenom II X6 Memory: 4 GB RAM Graphics: Radeon HD 7770 or Nvidia GeForce GTX 550 Ti Storage: 500 MB available space
